Deleting Versioned Files

Deleting a versioned file removes the versioned file, but the archive remains in the archive directory. The versioned file can be re-imported from the archive. You can delete a versioned file when it is no longer of use to the current project.

To delete versioned files:

  1. Select the versioned file(s) you want to delete in the File pane.

  2. Select File | Delete. The Confirm Item Deletion dialog box appears and asks if you want to delete the item and all of its contents.

  3. Click Yes to delete the file. The versioned file is removed from the current project.

Restoring Versioned Files

If you have mistakenly deleted versioned files and now need to add them back to their original source control project, you can recreate the versioned files by importing the archives back into the project.
